about_the_game:
Step into the scorching heat of Bussy Master: FIREFUCKERS! Immerse yourself in a blazing world where sexy firefighters and their fiery friends brave the flames and ignite your deepest desires.

🧩 Puzzle Features:

  • Challenge your mind with two sizzling puzzle styles: fiery firefighter swapping and blazing inferno rotating. Develop clever strategies to reveal the secrets of the hot, sexy FIREFUCKERS!

🔥 Meet the Sexy Firefighters:

  • Unlock the hidden desires of 60+ captivating FIREFUCKERS, each burning with their own unique allure!

🖼️ Sensual Gallery:

  • Explore the smoldering charm of the FIREFUCKERS effortlessly. Dive into the temptation of each character through a user-friendly gallery interface.

❤️ Favorites System:

  • Select your most cherished FIREFUCKERS for swift access and succumb to their irresistible heat!

📷 Immersive Visuals:

  • Immerse yourself in the intense atmosphere of FIREFUCKERS with stunning 5K detail. Let the sexy firefighters set your senses ablaze!

🎵 Enchanting Soundtrack:

  • Feel the heat with a fiery soundtrack that fuels your steamy adventures. Let the music fan the flames of desire!

⚙️ Technical Customization:

  • Personalize your gaming experience to your wildest fantasies. Adjust settings like resolution, fullscreen mode, framerate, and more. Adapt to the sizzling temptations that lie ahead!



Embark on a thrilling journey through the dangerous world of Bussy Master: FIREFUCKERS, where your puzzle-solving skills reveal the passion and sexy allure of the firemen and their fiery friends who brave the flames!

All characters depicted are adults (18+).

content_descriptors.notes:
Bussy Master: FIREFUCKERS is a gay puzzle game containing graphic sexual content including nudity, sexual acts, genitalia, masturbation, bodily fluids & BDSM themes. All sexual acts contain consenting adult characters.
All characters are adults (18+).

name: Bussy Master: FIREFUCKERS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required for sweet tunes
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

short_description: Step into the fiery world of Bussy Master: FIREFUCKERS! Unravel sexy puzzle challenges featuring scorching firefighters in dangerous, passion-filled scenarios. Unlock the allure of 60+ firemen, immerse in stunning visuals, and let the heat of desire ignite your passion!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
